column5: United Nuclear Products  Offers a glow in the dark paint that lasts way longer on a charge than typical glow paint used on store bought lures.  " Our phosphorescent powder is doped with the         element Europium, along with other rare earth elements that give it an         astonishing glow         time of over 12 hours! It is both non-radioactive and non-toxic."  http://www.unitednuclear.com/glow.htm  All kinds of interesting stuff on this site, including magnets so strong they can crush fingers! (might be good for lure retrieval)
Good stuff, thanks for sharing. I'm doing my release tools and rod holders and risers in the stuff this year. :-)
Those magnets might be strong enough to pull in let's say a bicycle?... Hey Snag!...
or that old car that sits off the point in cook's bay
